content.rendered:
Product reviews with free photos & videos for social proof

Judge.me helps you collect and display star ratings and reviews about your products and Shopify store. Social proof from reviews and other user-generated content like photos and videos increases your conversion rate, organic traffic, and buyer engagement. Our photo and video reviews are free!

Benefits:

  • Built-in Judge.me integration in our themes
  • No manual coding adjustments
  • Automatically adjust Judge.me widget to theme structure

Promotion offer:

  • 45 days of free trial

Awesome Plan includes all features – only 15 USD/month. For BullTheme users, the first 45 days are free

Condition of participation:

Users first time install Judge.me via FoxEcom’s referral link

App details Get promotions
